name: WORN
description:
This is my first native c++ game with WinAPI.

I use OpenGL1.x and MinGW.

<How To Play>

It's Simple. Realy Simple.

You are the last of Squares.

[1]Click to Start.

[2]Using Arrow key, avoid Circle's shoot.

[3]Don't be Circle.

##2019.04.17 

[1] Add Item.

Now, Player can restore specific edge.

[2] Add Random

Circles change shoot patterns.

##2019.04.18

[1] OpenAL Critical Issue.

I solve it!
